title: Kaceytron
body:
what do u guys think of her being Bronze 5? .... Her smurf was gold last season though

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Kaceytron is what you call a "view-whore", someone who gets money from acting like a complete ass.

I'm surprised Riot hasn't banned her saggy tits since she's literally just trolling in ranked.
To the people who actually donate to her are fucking stupid, that just encourages what she is doing and she is getting paid whilst doing it.
True you saw his post about shaming that guy right?! Tryhard
'Stop staring at my boobs and opressing me,im a proffesional female gamer'

She's a troll that deliberately plays like an arse on stream because it gets her views.
Her stream is entirely an act designed to infuriate people who take games seriously, and bring out the desperate neckbeards that will do anything for female attention.

The people that hate on her are really just jealous that they can't do the same and make the sweet bank she does.
Her smurf? She bought all her accounts. same like nicktron bought a diamond account lately. they deserve nothing but bronze aha

> [{quoted}](name=The Cards Master,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cbri0EoN,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-13T02:34:33.333+0000)
>
> Her smurf? She bought all her accounts. same like nicktron bought a diamond account lately. they deserve nothing but bronze aha

Her smurf is currently Bronze 1 from Gold hahaha but they deserve being Bronze

Those players suck colossal ass. All they are doing is selling their bodies, they know it and we know it and don't deserve the recognition they get.

All they do is join games with other, better players, and get carried to wins, now it seems as though they are being found out how bad they are.

EDIT: I have a link to a pic of her that is not safe for these forums if anyone wants it. Yes, they are just selling their bodies to make easy money.
